snippet: His decision to leave the channel comes a few days after Al Jazeera took control of Current TV. Later this year, the Qatar-owned broadcaster plans to turn the channel into an Americanized version of the international news channel Al Jazeera English.
abstract: His decision to leave the channel comes a few days after Al Jazeera took control of Current TV. Later this year, the Qatar-owned broadcaster plans to turn the channel into an Americanized version of the international news channel Al Jazeera English.

headline.main: Eliot Spitzer Ends His Show on Current TV
headline.print_headline: Spitzer Brings ‘Viewpoint’ Show on Current TV to an End
